entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to flurries at times heavy near midnight and ending overnight then clearing. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. Temperature steady near minus 30.
entry.summary: Sunny. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 30. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
